title: Question
body: Does the unskilled report mean anything because i have to use it 2-3 times every game

replies.body: It means those people are less likely to be put in the same game as you in "normals". Has no real bearing on ranked ques.
Last I heard, reports have absolutely no affect on whether you're matched with that player again.
There was a post just before this season about reporting and how it effects things.

wow harsh

You're matched with people of your skill level though so http://www.snickers.com/Resources/images/share/snickers.jpg
